attributes.action: Change the electoral system in this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We want to see changes in the way our country is governed and in the way MPs are elected.  We petition the PM to introduce the following measures in time for the next general election:
1. Proportional Representation.
2. A fully elected upper chamber.
3. Prospective parliamentary candidates to be selected by the local electorate not by committee.
4. Abolish party whips.

We cannot have a fair and just society until we get a fair and just government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
